title: Fort Myers shooting victim: 'I don't wanna die'
content:
Autoplay:Fort Myers shooting victim: 'I don't wanna die'CONNECTING...
FORT MYERS, Fla. -- One of the shooting victims in the multiple overnight club shootings in Fort Myers took to Facebook from the hospital early Monday.
Timothy Settles posted a brief look at his face in a Facebook Live video. He says nothing in the 3-second video.
Previously, he posted that he was headed to Club Blu.
Later, he posted a simple "I don't wabna die" (sic).
At least fifteen people were shot and two people were killed after gunfire erupted outside a Fort Myers nightclub on teen night late Sunday night.
**UPDATE** - Around 2pm Monday, Settles posted another update, saying: "I'm good y'all...I'm blessed."
